summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5949 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 1 and 2 , Replat of Green Lake Home Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by East Green Lake Way, Latona Avenue, Sunnyside Avenue, North 75th Street and Woodlawn Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79206, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
